mapper.insert: insert into t_tempcarteinfo (TCI_ID, TCI_Swift_Number, TCI_State, TCI_Table_ID, TCI_Customer_ID, TCI_Mem_ID, TCI_Waiter_ID, TCI_Dish_Nums, TCI_Amount_Peoplo, TCI_Repast_Time, TCI_Consume_Amount, TCI_Cost_Amount, TCI_Discount, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy, TCI_Remark) values (#{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tciTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciMemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciWaiterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciRemark,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
mapper.update: update t_tempcarteinfo set TCI_Swift_Number = #{tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCI_State = #{tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TCI_Table_ID = #{tciTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Customer_ID = #{tciCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Mem_ID = #{tciMemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Waiter_ID = #{tciWaiterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Dish_Nums = #{tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Amount_Peoplo = #{tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Repast_Time = #{tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TCI_Consume_Amount = #{tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Cost_Amount = #{tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Discount = #{tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Remark = #{tciRemark,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where TCI_ID = #{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TCI_ID, TCI_Swift_Number, TCI_State, TCI_Table_ID, TCI_Customer_ID, TCI_Mem_ID, TCI_Waiter_ID, TCI_Dish_Nums, TCI_Amount_Peoplo, TCI_Repast_Time, TCI_Consume_Amount, TCI_Cost_Amount, TCI_Discount, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy, TCI_Remark from t_tempcarteinfo where TCI_ID = #{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
